EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Documenting RESTful APIs.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: Documenting RESTful APIs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join us for tomorrow's webinar Documenting RESTful APIs with Andy Wilkinson. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, February 3, 2015
North America: 10:00am PST (San Francisco, GMT-08:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e2040209d0ea0f52193eefe2dfe8816c8> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 666 518 914
Thank you,
